name: Talking to Computers with Dr. Perl
name_original: Talking to Computers with Dr. Perl
description:
Note: The Web version is kinda buggy especially when it comes to displaying text??? But it works if you're on Firefox (not on Chrome!)

Play as Scampi, a computer scientist (who did not actually end up making the cut RIP) trying to teach your friend Dr. Perl (part-chatbot, part-Roomba, 50% fish tank, 100% sweet boi) how to navigate spaces!

It isn't very clear (there's not as much chatbot dialogue as I would have liked there to be!) so here's an important HINT:
Try telling Perl to "move" + a direction (up/down/left/right) + (number of spaces)

My first Unity 2D game and first GGJ; I'm so so proud of how much I learned, and of how cute my baby is!
